title: Subbundle
summary: In mathematics, a subbundle U {\displaystyle U} of a vector bundle V {\displaystyle V} on a topological space X {\displaystyle X} is a collection of linear subspaces U x {\displaystyle U_{x}} of the fibers V x {\displaystyle V_{x}} of V {\displaystyle V} at x {\displaystyle x} in X , {\displaystyle X,} that make up a vector bundle in their own right.
